summary: "ALF" was a popular TV comedy about an alien named Gordon Shumway (ALF stands for Alien Life Form) who crashed into the garage of a regular American family. They welcomed him, and the show followed their adventures together. It starred Max Wright and was performed by puppeteer Paul Fusco. "ALF" ran for four seasons with 99 episodes, ending with an unfinished story. There were plans for a reboot, but it was canceled. Recently, companies have bought the rights to create new "ALF" content.
title: ALF (TV series)
